s0: ^This is... was your body. It's undeniable. There is a pool of blood beneath your body and a bloodied knife beside it.

Body: ^Come to a final conclusion about your death.
Pockets: ^In the left coat pocket you find a letter from an unknown sender.
^"This is the final straw." It reads.
^"Deliver on what you've promised immediately or we will have to pay a visit to you and your family."
^The paper is crumpled, as if it has been read over and over again.
Conclude: ^You know now that you have all the information you need to make a conclusion.
^All you have to do is make sense of the memories you've uncovered.
^You must have killed yourself out of stress.
^You must have been killed for refusing to work with whoever was coercing you.
^Your wife must have killed you because she found out what you were doing.
Wrong: ^That doesn't seem quite right... but you don't have any better ideas.
^It's time to face the Grim Reaper.
Right: ^The conclusion settles into you with finality. This is what happened.
^It's finally time to face the Grim Reaper.
